class.name: SshAgent
class.description: A [build feature](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/SSH+Agent) which runs SSH agent during a build with the specified SSH key loaded

function.name: sshAgent
function.description: Adds a [build feature](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/SSH+Agent) which runs SSH agent during a build with the specified SSH key loaded

param.name: teamcitySshKey
param.description: [Uploaded SSH key](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/SSH+Keys+Management) name to load into an SSH agent
